name: unity-builder
description: Build Unity projects for different platforms.
author: Webber <webber@takken.io>

scripts.build: yarn && tsc && ncc build lib --source-map --license licenses.txt
scripts.gcp-secrets-tests: cross-env cloudRunnerCluster=aws cloudRunnerTests=true readInputOverrideCommand="gcloud secrets versions access 1 --secret="{0}"" populateOverride=true readInputFromOverrideList=UNITY_EMAIL,UNITY_SERIAL,UNITY_PASSWORD yarn test -i -t "cloud runner"
scripts.gcp-secrets-cli: cross-env cloudRunnerTests=true readInputOverrideCommand="gcloud secrets versions access 1 --secret="{0}"" yarn ts-node src/index.ts -m cli --populateOverride true --readInputFromOverrideList UNITY_EMAIL,UNITY_SERIAL,UNITY_PASSWORD
scripts.aws-secrets-cli: cross-env cloudRunnerTests=true readInputOverrideCommand="aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --secret-id {0}" yarn ts-node src/index.ts -m cli --populateOverride true --readInputFromOverrideList UNITY_EMAIL,UNITY_SERIAL,UNITY_PASSWORD
scripts.test-cli: cross-env cloudRunnerTests=true yarn ts-node src/index.ts -m cli --projectPath test-project
scripts.test-i: yarn run test-i-aws && yarn run test-i-k8s
scripts.test-i-f: yarn run test-i-aws && yarn run test-i-k8s && yarn run cli-k8s && yarn run cli-aws
scripts.test-i-aws: cross-env cloudRunnerTests=true cloudRunnerCluster=aws yarn test -i -t "cloud runner"
scripts.test-i-k8s: cross-env cloudRunnerTests=true cloudRunnerCluster=k8s yarn test -i -t "cloud runner"
